title: STAT+: In a financial pinch, major health insurers are turning to AI for help
description: Facing shrinking profits and higher costs, health insurers are accelerating adoption of AI throughout their sprawling operations.
content: Facing shrinking profits and higher costs, health insurers are accelerating adoption of AI throughout their sprawling operations.
